description.en:
9-year-old Tamashiro Dan is teased relentlessly by others for being weak and small until his grandfather teaches him table tennis and gives him an old worn-out racket. Four years, later he's left Germany with his family to Japan, to prove himself on a bigger stage.

[b]Included one-shots:[/b]
Volume 2:
[*]Koi ni Sake Mikoto (恋に咲けミコト) - [i]Previously unpublished; 52nd Jump Treasure Rookie Award, Honorable Mention (2011)[/i]
[*]Kokoro no Naka no Juusetsuken (心の中の銃切剣) - [i]Jump Live[/i]
Volume 3:
[*]Dov no Kyuuki (ドブの吸鬼) - [i]Jump Next 2014 Winter[/i]
[*]Akage no Acho!! (赤毛のアチョー!!) - [i]Shounen Jump 2015 #16[/i]

[sub]As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Full Drive were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.[/sub]
